name: SecureMetric Technology
tag_list: software-dongle, software-protection-usb-dongle, hardware-dongle, software-license-control-key, anti-piracy-software-dongle-lock, usb-dongle-key, 2-factor-authenthication-security, enhance-password-security, smart-cards, smart-card-token, usb-token, usb-k
overview:
The Company Introduction of SecureMetric

SecureMetric is a fast growing digital security technology driven company that well recognized as one of the pioneer player in this region with full capability of producing our own security devices and solution with R&D center and production facilities in Malaysia and China. As a multinational and multi-races based company, SecureMetricâ€™s technical team consist of top security experts from China, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Vietnam and United Kingdom. Cross region and culture exposure made SecureMetric a company that always ahead with others with our innovative products and services that always best fit the market here.

SecureMetric is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, with subsidiaries in Beijing, Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Jakarta and Singapore. Next, the company is aiming to establish local presence throughout South East Asia region before end of 2012. Additional to the South East Asia, SecureMetric has appointed more than 20 channel partners from other regions as per our international marketing network.

On top of supporting to more than 2,000 software developers worldwide on protecting their software copyright and licensing, SecureMetric also has successfully implemented many high profile 2-Factor Authentication and Cryptography projects to many well-know financial institutions and government agencies across the regions. With our commitment on continuously R&D on improving our products and solutions, together with our aggressive marketing efforts, SecureMetric is confident that we will continue doing well and to ensure our clients are always being secured with what we offer.

The Philosophy of SecureMetric

“Formula for Strong Digital Security” is our company slogan. Strong security methodology to effectively combat today increasing computer fraud is SecureMetric business priority. We take digital security needs seriously as our business challenge. Our target is to become the locally grown regional leading providers in niche Digital Security Industry with innovative technology with highly competitive pricing that fit the market. Why pay more when you can get better option with us, â€œQuality Product at Lower Price with Better Support!”.

The Business of SecureMetric

Software Licensing and Copyright Protection SecureMetric offers Secure Software Copyright & Intellectual Property Protection solution for software developers to protect their software licensing against risk of software piracy. We designed various models that offer flexibility to different licensing requirements and budgets.

2-Factor Authentication Security SecureMetric offers industry highest security options for 2-Factor Authentication suitable for Web based Application Security, Public Key Infrastructure Implementation, Enterprise IT Security, Logical and Physical Access Security, VPN Security, Data/Email Encryption, etc.

Advanced Smart Card Technologies SecureMetric offers advanced smart card products which developed base on latest smart card technologies. Strong domain expertise in smart card technologies also allow us to offer smart card operating system OEM or customization for projects required highly personalized smart card solutions.

Cryptography Security SecureMetric is the exclusive business partners with certified and trained experts on AEP Networks selected cryptography products.

Digital Imaging Security SecureMetric offers unique digital imaging stamping software that can add on to projects which require both logical and physical security on mission critical documents and forms.

Professional Services SecureMetric offers to share with our clients and business partners as to ensure the success of their digital security implementation where the popular professional services in demand are:

Software Protection Vulnerability Test Security Infrastructure Assessment Security Framework Development 2-Factor Authentication Validation Public Key Infrastructure Consultancy Digital Imaging Security Consultancy Cryptography Implementation
